ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-08-08
          -The Committee Secretariat was directed to prepare a draft bill in substitution of House Bills Numbered 194, 508, 2591, 2932, 3691, 4822 and 5977. House Bills Numbered 5781 & 5956 will also be drafted by the CWGE Secretariat and House Bill No. 5213 will be tackled separately per request of the Author, Rep. Ramon V.A. "RAV" Rocamora.
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-01
          -Second Deliberation of House Bill Nos. 194, 508, 2591, 2932, 3691 4822 and 5213
      3. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-06
          -18th Mother Committee Meeting. Consideration of the bill.
      4. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-09-05
          -21st Mother Committee Meeting. Continuation of consideration of the Draft Substitute Bill re Gender-Based Street, Public and Online Spaces Act in substitution of House Bill Numbered 5213, 5781 and 5956.
MOTHER BILL: HB08794
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2017-03-13
